features: Screen Grab® with a premium and durable leather thumb is touchscreen-compatible, giving you freedom to control your device
Durable, premium leather on the palm is soft and supple, combining maximum comfort with waterproof performance
Brushed microfiber fixed lining pulls moisture away from your hand
Waterproof Dryride membrane 2. 0 is extra-thin and waterproof, protects hands from wind, and wicks away moisture
D-ring and hook; Removable wrist leash
